## Work Experience

------------------------------------------------------

### Qingdao Center for Disease Control and Prevention  

Staff Member 

-	Managed health records of the citizens in Tsingdao and assisted in occupational disease assessment meetings

-	Conducted multivariate logistic regression to analyze the relationship between occupational factors and women depression and to analyze the relationship between tobacco use and occupational diseases


### Shandong Qianfoshan Hospital 

Intern Physician

-	Monitored nutritional and health status of patients and collaborated with surgeons in surgeries in obstetrics and urology

- Input and standardized data on infants’ health status and children’s bone density using EpiData
